name: oar
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a long pole with a wide, flat part at one end, used for rowing a boat: a pair of oars She dipped her oars into the water and pulled. Compare
paddle noun (POLE)
Anna Dudek Photography/Moment Open/GettyImages

a long pole with a wide, flat part at one end which is used to row a boat (= move it through water)
